		    from OUTPUTS using typemaps.i

##########################################################################

#files: 
	## ex2.h: header file containing the function prototypes.
	## ex2.c: c file containing the function declarations.
	## ex2.i: the SWIG descriptor file
	## make: the make file for example2.
	
	## Rest of the files are automatically generated.
